string.text: Zombie spawning point
Don't let zombies near the stalkers on the roof.
It is necessary to cover the stalkers on the roof while they are working with the valve installation. The repair team cannot be approached by zombies.
Zombie spawning point
Don't let zombies near the stalkers in the hangar.
It is necessary to cover the stalkers in the hangar while they are working with the valve installation. The repair team cannot be approached by zombies.
Protect the scientist base
Protect the scientist base
Protect the scientist base.
During a zombie attack, the bunker doors of the scientists are locked. It is necessary to repel the zombie attack to enter the bunker with the scientists.
Talk to Sakharov
It is necessary to reach the base and talk to Professor Sakharov.
Clarify the position
Clarify the position with the group leader
Clarify the position with the group leader.
Don't let the repair team die
Hold the position!
Hold the position!
Deliver the documents to Sakharov
Deliver the documents to Sakharov
Deliver the documents to Sakharov. They might explain the reason for such strong psi-emissions on Yantar.
Break through to the installation
Break through to the complex's territory

The surroundings of the complex are teeming with zombies. Together with the Lefties group, you need to break through to its territory. You must hurry: the level of psi radiation can reach critical levels at any moment.
Find documents
Find a PDA with documents

A group of stalkers found important documents on the territory of the complex that could help Saharov determine the cause of the powerful psi radiation on Yantar. The group's signal was lost on leaving the complex. You must find the PDA with the documents.
Meet with Lefty
Meet with the Lefty squad
A group of stalkers is preparing to break through to the complex's territory during a lull in the level of psi radiation. You must meet with the group's commander - Lefty.
Take position on the roof of the hangar
Follow the stalker to the roof of the hangar.
Lefty ordered everyone to take their positions. You must follow the stalker to the roof to reach your position.
Bring the "Scarlet Flower"

Help me out, mercenary. There's an artifact in the Zone that we've dubbed the "Scarlet Flower". It's useless to stalkers... but women love it so much that they can only dream of such a souvenir. Anyone would give themselves to you with such a gift. I have a date coming up soon and I really need this "Scarlet Flower". It was seen around here recently. The artifact looks like a magical flower, it glows day and night. Retrieve the artifact for me and I'll reward you!
Return the souvenir grenade

Mercenary, I need one thing... I lost a souvenir, it looks like a grenade.. but it's not a grenade... well, it's a grenade, but a training one... Anyway, return it to me... When I was crawling around the factory, something hit me hard... It messed up my brains and I almost forgot who I was... I only came to my senses here, and the grenade must have been left there. Return it to me...
